Query: How do I reset my password?
Agent_Response: To reset your password, click on "Forgot Password" on the login page and follow the instructions.

Query: Where is my order?
Agent_Response: Your order is on its way and should arrive by July 1st.

Query: Can I change my shipping address?
Agent_Response: Yes, you can change your shipping address by logging into your account and going to the "Orders" section.

Query: What is your return policy?
Agent_Response: You can return any item within 30 days of purchase for a full refund.

Query: Do you offer gift wrapping?
Agent_Response: Yes, we offer gift wrapping for an additional fee at checkout.

Query: How do I use a promo code?
Agent_Response: Enter your promo code at checkout to receive your discount.

Query: What are your business hours?
Agent_Response: Our business hours are Monday to Friday, 9 AM to 5 PM.

Query: Can I cancel my order?
Agent_Response: You can cancel your order within 24 hours of placing it.

Query: How do I track my shipment?
Agent_Response: You can track your shipment using the tracking number provided in your order confirmation email.

Query: Do you ship internationally?
Agent_Response: Yes, we ship internationally. Shipping fees and delivery times vary by location.

Query: How do I update my account information?
Agent_Response: Log in to your account and go to the "Account Settings" section to update your information.

Query: What payment methods do you accept?
Agent_Response: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and Apple Pay.

Query: How can I contact customer service?
Agent_Response: You can contact our customer service via email at support@example.com or by phone at 123-456-7890.

Query: Is there a warranty on your products?
Agent_Response: Yes, all our products come with a one-year warranty.

Query: How do I apply for a refund?
Agent_Response: To apply for a refund, please fill out the refund request form on our website.

Query: What should I do if I received a damaged item?
Agent_Response: If you received a damaged item, please contact our customer service for assistance.

Query: Do you offer bulk discounts?
Agent_Response: Yes, we offer bulk discounts for orders over 100 units. Please contact sales@example.com for more details.

Query: How long does it take to process a return?
Agent_Response: Returns are processed within 5-7 business days of receiving the item.

Query: What is the status of my refund?
Agent_Response: Your refund is currently being processed and should appear in your account within 3-5 business days.

Query: How do I change my subscription plan?
Agent_Response: You can change your subscription plan by logging into your account and going to the "Subscription" section.

Query: Do you have physical stores?
Agent_Response: No, we are an online-only retailer.

Query: How do I unsubscribe from your newsletter?
Agent_Response: You can unsubscribe from our newsletter by clicking the "Unsubscribe" link at the bottom of any newsletter email.

Query: Can I get a copy of my invoice?
Agent_Response: Yes, you can download a copy of your invoice from your account under "Order History."

Query: What happens if I miss a delivery?
Agent_Response: If you miss a delivery, the carrier will leave a notice with instructions on how to reschedule.

Query: Do you offer price matching?
Agent_Response: Yes, we offer price matching for identical items from reputable retailers.

Query: How do I know if an item is in stock?
Agent_Response: Our website shows real-time stock availability for all items.

Query: Can I get expedited shipping?
Agent_Response: Yes, expedited shipping options are available at checkout.

Query: Do you offer financing options?
Agent_Response: Yes, we offer financing options through our partner, Klarna.

Query: How do I leave a review?
Agent_Response: You can leave a review by logging into your account and going to the "Order History" section.

Query: What is the delivery time for international orders?
Agent_Response: Delivery time for international orders varies by location but typically takes 7-14 business days.
